title: Did Dolphins and Swans ‘Return’ to Italian Waterways Amid COVID-19 Lockdown?
subtitle: A few wildlife sightings were excitedly shared across social media as a note of sunny news amid the bleak reality of the coronavirus pandemic.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Amid a nationwide COVID-19 lockdown, Italians reported seeing wildlife such as swans and dolphins "returning" to newly tranquil waterways, ports, and canals.
